pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Command line tool to generate output from a jinja template| short | Name | Description ||-------|-----------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|| -t | --template | Path to the jinja template || -v | --variables | JSON string or JSON File.
Example (must be on this format; note the double-quotes):
-v '{\"VERSION\": \"1.0\"}'
May also be a path to a JSON file. || -d | --destination | Path to where the rendered template will go |
